element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates a longitudinal profile along a given route

element.name: ROUTE
element.text: The layer that containing the route. If the layer has several features, the algorithm will just use the first one..

element.name: LAYERS
element.text: Layers whose values will be studied along the profile route.

element.name: PROFILEPOINTS
element.text:
A new points layer with the following fields in its attributes table: * X: X coordinate of each point. * Y: Y coordinate of each point. * Z: Z coordinate of each point. * Projected distance: projected distance from origin. * Real distance: real distance from origin. * Values of the selected additional layers.
A new point is added for each cell crossed by the defined route
